message:
Here are the final results of Swarm Robotics:

Software Team:
1. Bikash Sahoo (18CS30012)
2. Deekshith Kanagala (17MA20022)
3. Saurabh Kumar (17ME10058)
4. Shreyase Rangamani (17EE30021)
5. Shalini Mukhopadhyay (17EE10056)
6. Rohan Meena (18CS30038)
7. Jagriti Agarwal (18MT10013)
8. Sara Jain (18CH10048)

Embedded Team:
1. Arun Sammit Pandey (17EC30010)
2. Jayesh Sharma (17IE10018)
3. Krushnasis Pradhan (18EC10027)
4. Radhika Agrawal  (18MI10029)
5. Rudrajyoti Roy (18EC10047)
6. Yuvraj Kumar (17AE10034)

Mechanical Team:
1. Kartheek Vajrala (18ME10027)
2. Ankit Behera (18IM30005)
3. Nitish Kumar (18EE30017)

Congratulations! And welcome to the pack

message:
Calling in first and second-year students!

The registration link for selections is: http://swarm-iitkgp.github.io/recruit

Swarm Robotics will recruit members for its software team, through a contest. Please follow this link for further details:
https://github.com/Swarm-IITKgp/SwarmSoftwareSelections

The selections for the embedded and the mechanical team will be held on coming Tuesday and Wednesday (5th and 6th Feb), from 6pm onwards at Swarm Lab (Upper Lab, Gymkhana).

See you there!

Hola Guys! We hope that our problem statement excited you as much as it excites us, come, be a part of Swarm Robotics, IIT Kharagpur.

Fill out the form at http://swarm-iitkgp.github.io/recruit.

For Software selection please visit github.com/Swarm-IITKgp/SwarmSoftwareSelections for an exciting game.

For embedded and mechanical we'll provide you a slot for the interview after you fill the form.

Hola Guys! We hope that our problem statement excited you as much as it excites us, come, be a part of Swarm Robotics, IIT Kharagpur.

Fill out the form at http://swarm-iitkgp.github.io/recruit.

For Software selection please visit github.com/Swarm-IITKgp/SwarmSoftwareSelections for an exciting game.

For embedded and mechanical we'll provide you a slot for the interview after you fill the form.

story: Swarm, IIT Kharagpur shared The Scholars' Avenue's post.
message: Swarm, IIT Kharagpur shared The Scholars' Avenue's post. Swarm Robotics IIT Kharagpur took part in DRDO's DRUSE 2018 (DRDO Robotics & Unmanned Systems Exposition) which was held in Pune from 23rd May to 25th May 2018 and won the First Runners Up position to win a cash prize of 1 Lac Rupees for further research and implementation. This was the culmination of the national level challenge which had over 1000 entries out of which 164 qualified for the Zonals on 28th March 2018 where they were crowned the runners-up in the 30 teams selected for the finals. This team consists of UG Students from various departments and years who work together and had stayed back during the summers to prepare for this competition under the guidance of Prof. Somesh Kumar who is the Professor-in-charge for the project. The Scholars' Avenue congratulates the team for their strong showing and wishes them the best of luck for their future goals.

message:
Swarm, IIT Kharagpur is conducting their first round of interviews today at 6.00pm in the upper Gymkhana Lab.

We will be conducting the interviews for the software team as well as the embedded team.

When one isn't enough, you call the swarm.

We are conducting our Introductory Seminar on Thursday 23rd February 2017.

Register here for the swarm selections:
https://tinyurl.com/SwarmSelections2017

and here for ARK Selections:
https://quadrotor-iitkgp.github.io/recruit

We are taking 1st years as well as 2nd years.

See you there!
